marklogic.body:
LCC Idlib from Arabic: for the second consecutive day Jarjanaz is under violent shelling and the regime's forces are Burning houses and shops, arrresting randomly people.
Al Qrati: Since this morning, strong explosions have been shaking the town and homes have been Raided. 10 tanks have been called to storm the town and comb it, and shasing Jarjanaz's residents. There are still an emergency law implemented with total electricity and communication outage. The residents have fled in their majority.
